attributes.action: Give every citizen £400 per month to afford decent food
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every MP gets (on top of their current allowances which include more than £20000 for SECOND homes!) £400 per month for food.
I wish the same privilege to be give to ordinary British Citizens as most won't be able to afford decent food, resulting in ill-health, poor productivity, absenteism and increased sickness benefit payments.  £400 a month would buy every person decent, good quality food.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
